text:
Hello,

I have installed cocoon 2 on tomcat 4 on my computer. It is a K6-II under 
Windows Me, and I have JDK 1.3.1.

When I accessed cocoon's documentation with SVG pictures, I got the following 
error message :

"JAVA caused an error in KERNEL32. It will be stopped."

I am owner of a SourceForge project that manipulates pictures using Sun's 
classes with code like that :

JPEGCodec.createJPEGDecoder(inputStream).decodeAsBufferedImage();

When runned by multiple threads at the same time, it produces exactly the same 
error.

I do not know if it happens under Unix / Linux, but I prefer to tell you.

I solved my bug by synchronizing this line.

Thank you, and merry christmas!
